channel.title: Growing on Seattle African Violet Society ( SAVS )
channel.description: Recent content in Growing on Seattle African Violet Society ( SAVS )

item.title: Growing Violets
item.description: ANYONE can grow beautiful African violets ANYWHERE if they will provide the simple conditions required for healthy growth. When you bring a new plant home, it may suffer at first until it gets acclimated to conditions in your home.
